  16. ‌type t =
  17.     Lident of string
  18.   | Ldot of t * string
  19.   | Lapply of t * t

  21. ‌let rec flat accu = function
  22.     Lident s -> s :: accu
  23.   | Ldot(lid, s) -> flat (s :: accu) lid
  24.   | Lapply(_, _) -> Misc.fatal_error "Longident.flat"

  26. ‌let flatten lid = flat [] lid

  28. ‌let last = function
  29.     Lident s -> s
  30.   | Ldot(_, s) -> s
  31.   | Lapply(_, _) -> Misc.fatal_error "Longident.last"


  34. ‌let rec split_at_dots s pos =
  35.   try
  36.     let dot = String.index_from s pos '.' in
  37.     String.sub s pos (dot - pos) :: split_at_dots s (dot + 1)
  38.   with Not_found ->
  39.     [String.sub s pos (String.length s - pos)]

  41. ‌let unflatten l =
  42.   match l with
  43.   | [] -> None
  44.   | hd :: tl -> Some (List.fold_left (fun p s -> Ldot(p, s)) (Lident hd) tl)

  46. let parse s =
  47.   match unflatten (split_at_dots s 0) with
  48.   | None -> Lident ""  (* should not happen, but don't put assert false
  49.                           so as not to crash the toplevel (see Genprintval) *)
  50.   | Some v -> v
